    Megatron roared in absolute anger as Airbomber began to shoot up his 
already messed up lair. He stomped forward and wrapped his tail gun's claw 
around his neck and pulled him close.
    "You will regreat ever wakeing up!" Megatron hissed, letting a few 
spitlets hits his face. He squeezed harder, sinking the ridges of his claw 
deeper into Airbombers throat. With two glareing optics, he looked to Kitkat 
to finish the intruder off. 

    Paralysis looked to his commander and apologised. "Forgive me, Sir. Shes 
in the bunker but said to call her on your comm. Is there anything else I can 
do for you?" He said to Quickstrike, saluting.

    Tarantulas was puzzled over the strange writings of the aliens that were 
scattered about, dead and rotting. The Triangle room was indeed the 
Operations Center of the bunker. It was complete with computers, 
Communications devices, and an odd kind of screen. 
    He tried another set of decodeing programs, but to no avail. The language 
of the aliens was very complicated. It made the Vok's language look like a 
walk in the park. Fustrated he slammed down his claw on the table.
    The spider hissed, "OH! These aliens are very crafty! But I have another 
card up my sleeve......" He then reached for one of Hell Beast's disks. The 
one that had told them where this place was might tell them something about 
this language. 
    He put the disk in and the odd runes on the screen suddenly began to 
change into Predaconese. He could completely understand it now. Hell Beast 
must have decoded them.....
    "Ah, excellent. Now to find out what happened here, and why." 

    Aracnia pushed open one of the sealed doors, now open of course. The room 
was warm, and dark. She changed her optics into Nightvision and entered.
    In the center of the room was a large cylider like object. She guessed it 
was the powersource for something.....but what? As she got closer she saw the 
control panel, but didnt understand a word on it. 
    She turned a left. This room was a mystery, but as soon as Tarantulas 
decoded the runes, she would unlock this mysterious puzzle.
